name: REI_PGT_TYPES
description: This stores the types of preimplantation genetic testing (PGT) that will be done for a fertility treatment cycle. This option is available only when the cycle's version is 2 or greater (INFERTILITY_CYCLE.REI_CYCLE_VERSION_C, Chronicles item ICF-86991).

columns.name: CYCLE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the cycle record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: REI_PGT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The types of preimplantation genetic testing done for the cycle. This item is available only when the Version (INFERTILITY_CYCLE.REI_CYCLE_VERSION_C, Chronicles item ICF-86991) is 2 or greater.
entries: Preimplantation Genetic Testing for Aneuploidy Detection
Preimplantation Genetic Testing for Monogenic Disorders or Single Gene Defects
Preimplantation Genetic Testing for Chromosomal Structural Rearrangements
Preimplantation Genetic Testing for Polygenic Disease Risk Reduction
